info.description: Authentication and Authorization microservice for bus booking system
info.title: Bus Booking Auth Service API

get.description: Get list of all buses in the fleet

post.description: Assign a seat map configuration to a specific bus

get.description: Get list of buses that don't have conflicting trips in the specified time range
Get list of all available routes

post.description: Create a new pickup or dropoff point for a route

delete.description: Delete a route stop (must maintain at least 1 pickup and 1 dropoff)

get.description: Get list of all seat map templates

post.description: Create a new seat map template with default seat layout

get.description: Get all available seat type configurations with colors and multipliers
Get a seat map by ID with all seat configurations

put.description: Update a seat map's name, description, bus type, or active status

delete.description: Delete a seat map and all its seats

post.description: Delete all existing seats and create a new layout with specified dimensions

put.description: Update multiple seats' configurations in a single request

get.description: Get list of all trips with route and bus information

post.description: Assign a bus to a scheduled trip with conflict checking

put.description: Update the status of a trip (admin only)

get.description: Get list of all admin users

post.description: Create a new admin user account

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific user
Redirect to GitHub OAuth
Handle GitHub OAuth callback
Redirect to Google OAuth

post.description: Handle Google OAuth callback with ID token
Authenticate user and return JWT tokens

parameters.description: Refresh token to revoke (optional, can be from cookie)
parameters.name: request

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token from cookie or body

parameters.description: Refresh token (optional, can be from HttpOnly cookie)
parameters.name: request

post.description: Create a new booking with passenger details

get.description: Get bookings for guest users by email or phone
Get authenticated user's booking history
Get booking details by booking reference number

delete.description: Release temporary seat locks for a session

post.description: Temporarily lock seats for a user session during checkout (10 min expiry)
Confirm a booking after successful payment
Resend e-ticket to the booking contact email

get.description: Download all e-tickets for a booking as a single PDF
Get all reviews by the authenticated user
Get route details with pickup and dropoff points
Download e-ticket PDF by ticket ID
Get detailed information about a specific trip
Get similar trips on the same route for the given trip
Get paginated reviews for a specific trip

post.description: Create a review for a completed trip (authenticated users only)

get.description: Get list of available seats for a specific trip

seat_id.description: Which seat on the seat map

bus_id.description: Foreign key to buses (nullable before assignment)

x-enum-comments.TripStatusScheduled: Trip is scheduled but not started

x-enum-descriptions: Trip is scheduled but not started

refresh_token.description: Optional - can be from body or cookie

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
